email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN STAR available for your steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Shanghai. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 300m. The cargo size is 25,000MT on CIF terms. Our starting freight quote is USD 45.50 per MT. Laycan is 25-30 Oct. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Connor
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the offer. USD 45.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
John Doe
Global Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I can offer USD 44.00 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 44.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 43.50? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 27 Oct - 1 Nov?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 43.50 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 27 Oct - 1 Nov. Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN STAR
- Cargo: 25,000MT Steel Coils
- Load Port: Rotterdam
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 27 Oct - 1 Nov
- Freight: USD 43.50 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 25,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best regards,
Sarah
